tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(100),
    repair_log TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedules (
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, maintenance_date)
);

CREATE TABLE RepairLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE repair_logs (
    repair_log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE Vehicle { vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_type VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), year INT, last_maintenance_date DATE }
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule { schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id UUID, schedule_date DATE, description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id) }
CREATE TABLE RepairLog { log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id UUID, repair_date DATE, repair_type VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id) }
CREATE TABLE MaintenancePersonnel { personnel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, personnel_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255) }

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceTask { task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), estimated_duration INT, assigned_personnel UUID, FOREIGN KEY (assigned_personnel) REFERENCES MaintenancePersonnel(personnel_id) }
